db:query-single.doc:name: SELECT Hospital from database
db:query-single.db:sql: SELECT HO.id, HO.max_capacity, HO.facility_name, (HO.max_capacity - COUNT(PA.state_issued_id)) as 'available_space' FROM Hospital HO LEFT JOIN Patient PA ON PA.hospital_id = HO.id WHERE id = :id GROUP BY id, max_capacity, facility_name

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { id: payload.id, max_capacity: payload.max_capacity default 0, avalable_space: payload.available_space default 0, facility_name: payload.facility_name default "" }

db:query-single.doc:name: SELECT Hospital from database
db:query-single.db:sql: SELECT id FROM Hospital WHERE id = :id

db:query-single.doc:name: SELECT optimal hospital from database
db:query-single.db:sql: SELECT id, max_capacity, facility_name, (max_capacity - COUNT(PA.state_issued_id)) as 'available_space' FROM Hospital HO LEFT JOIN Patient PA ON PA.hospital_id = HO.id GROUP BY id, max_capacity, facility_name ORDER BY available_space desc LIMIT 1

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- if(!isEmpty(payload) and payload.id != 0 and payload.available_space > 0) payload.id else null

db:query-single.doc:name: SELECT hospital from database
db:query-single.db:sql: SELECT id, max_capacity, facility_name, (max_capacity - COUNT(PA.state_issued_id)) as 'available_space' FROM Hospital HO JOIN Patient PA ON PA.hospital_id = HO.id WHERE id = :id

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { id: payload.id default 0, avalable_space: payload.available_space, max_capacity: payload.max_capacity default 0, facility_name: payload.facility_name default "" }
